description: You dream it, Lanzate makes it happen

metadata.title: Lanzate - You dream it, we make it happen
metadata.description: E-commerce platform for creating and managing your online stores

hero.subtitle: Managing your business has never been easier. Focus on growth while we give you full control
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of a person launching a rocket, symbolizing the launch of a new online store with Lanzate

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Must contain at least one number

profile.atLeastOneField: You must provide at least one field to update

page.title: Signup - Lanzate
page.description: Create your account to get started with Lanzate

header.title: Sign Up
header.description: Create your account to get started

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: Enter the email address associated with your account.

username.label: Username
username.tooltip: Enter the username associated with your account.

password.label: Password
password.tooltip: Enter the password associated with your account.

confirmPassword.label: Confirm Password
confirmPassword.tooltip: Enter the password associated with your account.

page.title: Login - Lanzate
page.description: Sign in to your account to continue

header.title: Welcome Back
header.description: Sign in to your account to continue

page.title: Reset Password - Lanzate
page.description: Request a password reset link to recover your account

header.title: Reset Password
header.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: Enter the email address associated with your account
email.description: We'll send you a link to reset your password

messages.success: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.

confirmation.title: Check Your Email
confirmation.description: We've sent a password reset link to your email address
confirmation.instructions: Please check your inbox and click the link in the email to reset your password. The link will expire in 24 hours.

note.title: Didn't receive the email?
note.message: Check your spam folder or try requesting a new password reset link.

page.title: Create New Password - Lanzate
page.description: Enter your new password to complete the reset process

header.title: Create New Password
header.description: Enter a strong password to secure your account

password.label: New Password
password.tooltip: Must be at least 8 characters with an uppercase letter and a number

confirmPassword.label: Confirm New Password
confirmPassword.tooltip: Must match the password entered above

messages.success: Password reset successfully. You can now log in.

page.title: Edit Profile - Lanzate
page.description: Manage your account settings and personal information

header.title: Edit Profile
header.description: Update your email and password settings

password.label: New Password
password.tooltip: Must be at least 8 characters with an uppercase letter and a number

confirmPassword.label: Confirm New Password
confirmPassword.tooltip: Must match the new password entered above

name.min: Store name must be at least 1 character
name.max: Store name must not exceed 100 characters

subdomain.format: Subdomain must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
subdomain.min: Subdomain must be at least 3 characters

limitReached.free: You have reached the maximum of 2 stores for your FREE account. Upgrade to PRO for up to 5 stores.
limitReached.pro: You have reached the maximum of 5 stores for your PRO account. Upgrade to ENTERPRISE for unlimited stores.

store.subdomainTaken: This subdomain is already taken. Please choose a different one.

dialog.title: Create New Store
dialog.description: Fill in the details below to create your new store.

upgradeTooltip.free: Upgrade to PRO for more stores
upgradeTooltip.pro: Upgrade to ENTERPRISE for unlimited stores

name.label: Store Name
name.tooltip: Enter the name of your store

subdomain.label: Subdomain
subdomain.tooltip: Your store URL will be subdomain.lanzate.com

messages.success: Store created successfully. Redirecting to your store...
